data.prayer: Jesus, please send your Spirit to Mauren, so they can have freedom.
data.verse: Now the Lord is the Spirit, and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Mauren, Liechtenstein
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Jesus, strengthen the church in Mauren, Liechtenstein by giving a prophet, as you said you would, who is bold and willing to correct. Lord, may the believers care about holiness as you do.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, how will they hear without a preacher? How will they preach unless they have a Bible? Please give the people in the state of Mauren access to a Bible in their own language.
data.verse: How, then, can they call on the one they have not believed in? And how can they believe in the one of whom they have not heard? And how can they hear without someone preaching to them? And how can anyone preach unless they are sent? As it is written: “How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news!”

data.prayer: Father, let love abound more and more in the church of Mauren, Liechtenstein.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight

data.prayer: Father, please help good, online teachers get the gospel on YouTube and into the the state of Mauren.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Father, guide the church in Mauren, Liechtenstein to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.prayer: Father, you have chosen the weak things of this world to confound the strong. Make the poor and outcast in the state of Mauren a testimony of your strength.
data.verse: God chose the foolish things of the world that he might put to shame those who are wise. God chose the weak things of the world, that he might put to shame the things that are strong;

data.section_summary:
the state of Mauren, Liechtenstein has a population of 4,500.

We estimate Mauren has 25 people who might know Jesus, 3,493 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 982 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 179 neighbors who need Jesus.
